text: Gennady Prokopenko (born 18 January 1964) is a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Perm
title: Gennady Prokopenko
